mapper.select: SELECT security_id AS securityId, -- 증권 ID security_account AS securityAccount, -- 증권 계좌 security_name AS securityName, -- 증권 이름 security_balance AS securityBalance, -- 증권 잔액 security_type AS securityType, -- 증권 유형 security_date AS securityDate, -- 증권 날짜 security_state AS securityState, -- 증권 상태 user_no AS userNo, -- 사용자 번호 security_code AS securityCode, -- 증권 코드 security_rate AS securityRate, -- 증권 이자율 security_interest AS securityInterest, -- 증권 이자 security_bank AS securityBank -- 증권 은행 FROM tb_security WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND security_code = #{securityCode}

SELECT stock_id AS stockId, -- 보유 주식 ID stock_type AS stockType, -- 주식 유형 stock_count AS stockCount, -- 주식 수량 stock_amount AS stockAmount, -- 주식 매입 단가 stock_date AS stockDate, -- 주식 날짜 stock_state AS stockState, -- 주식 상태 user_no AS userNo, -- 사용자 번호 stock_code AS stockCode, -- 주식 코드 stock_name AS stockName, -- 주식 이름 stock_balance AS stockBalance, -- 주식 잔액 security_account AS securityAccount, -- 주식 계좌 security_code AS securityCode -- 증권 코드 FROM tb_Stock WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND security_account = #{securityAccount}
